name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior PHP Engineer with 8 years of expertise in building high-performance web applications and API integrations. Proficient in **PHP**, **RESTful APIs**, and **web infrastructure**, I excel in developing secure coding practices while adhering to OOP, SOLID principles, and clean code methodologies. I have a strong focus on web security and design patterns, ensuring robust application architecture and performance. 

In addition to my PHP skills, I possess a comprehensive tech stack experience that includes **JavaScript**/**TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, along with full-stack technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. With significant cloud experience on **Azure** and **AWS**, I’ve successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms across the healthcare and financial sectors.

I am adept in microservices architecture and have implemented CI/CD automation to enhance development processes. My leadership experience includes mentoring team members while fostering a culture of problem-solving and effective communication. I have a strong foundation in integrating AI/ML capabilities into applications and am skilled in machine learning pipeline development using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
